definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Loud snores from the other room kept her awake.
sentences.chinese: 那边房间有人打鼾声音很大她无法入睡。

sentences.english: "Was I snoring?" she anxiously asked a friend.
sentences.chinese: “我打鼾了吗？”她不安地询问一个朋友。

sentences.english: It can also be, well, just snoring.
sentences.chinese: 也可能就仅仅是打鼾而已。

sentences.english: But snoring regularly can chip away at the quality of your own sleep.
sentences.chinese: 但是经常性的打鼾就会逐渐影响你自身的睡眠质量了。

sentences.english: The child with a cold in his nose snored all night.
sentences.chinese: 这个得了感冒的小孩整晚打鼾。

sentences.english: I didn't sleep because of his snoring.
sentences.chinese: 由于他打鼾，我一直未睡着。

sentences.english: I last night didn't sleep because my companion continuously snored .
sentences.chinese: 我昨天晚上睡不着，因为我的同伴一直打鼾。

sentences.english: Try not to smoke right before you go to bed because it causes irritation within the throat, which will make snoring more obvious.
sentences.chinese: 睡觉之前抽烟会刺激你的喉咙，会让你更容难打鼾。

sentences.english: Sex- and BMI-matched patients who did not snore served as control subjects.
sentences.chinese: 性别及BMI配对，没有打鼾的患者作为对照。

sentences.english: Heavy snoring does carry health risks, such as raising bloodpressure.
sentences.chinese: 严重的打鼾会为健康带来风险，比如使血压升高。

sentences.english: My grandpa was snoring, and he had never snored before in his sleep.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷在打鼾，他以前睡觉可从来不打鼾。

sentences.english: My grandpa was snoring, and he had never snored before in his sleep.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷在打鼾，他以前睡觉可从来不打鼾。

sentences.english: It's true that sleeping with a snorer can take a toll on your health.
sentences.chinese: 的确，与打鼾者同床共枕可以夺去你的健康。

sentences.english: I don't believe it. I've never snored before.
sentences.chinese: 我不信，我从来不打鼾的。

sentences.english: Everyone got up except the snorer.
sentences.chinese: 除打鼾者之外，每个人起来。

pinyin: shui4 mian2 hu1 xi1 zan4 ting2

definition: to grind one's teeth (during sleep)/pointless arguing/(coll.) molar
sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
